title: . . . I Have Sometimes Seen in the Sky What Seemed like Forms of Spirits (. . . J'ai quelquefois aperçu dans le ciel comme des formes d'esprits) (plate III) from La Tentation de Saint-Antoine
medium: Lithograph from an illustrated book with 22 lithographs on chine appliqué and 21 wood engravings (including wrapper and table of plates)
